data.title: Message from External Directors
data.meta_description: This is the EIZO About Us Message from External Directors page.
data.text:
Masaaki Suzuki

Leading Independent External Director

Has held top management positions at a financial institution, manufacturer, and real estate company as well as other positions in Japan and overseas. Applies his extensive experience and achievements in governance and compliance to contribute to enhancing EIZOâs corporate value.

Hiroji Takino

Independent External Director

Participated in the management of aãfinancial institution and subsequentlyãengaged in the management of a businessãcorporation. Provides helpful advice on theãmanagement of EIZO from a wide range ofãperspectives representing the viewpoint ofãstakeholders.

Toru Inoue

Independent External Director

Has a wealth of experience and a proven track record in business operations, planning, and accounting as a manager of a business corporation. With ample knowledge accumulated over many years in the electronics industry, he provides spot-on advice and supervision.

Masako Osuna

Independent External Director

Worked for many years at the Japan External Trade Organization (JETRO). At present, she is engaged in an extensive range of fields as the Professor of Industry-University Collaboration at the Kanazawa Institute of Technology. This wealth of experience and high level of expertise focused on international economics enables her to provide appropriate advice and checks to ensure the appropriateness of the boardâs decision-making.
